Content.Text: Your watering can is almost empty.
It's empty, so fill it up!
Your bag is full! Take something out!
Your bag is full! Take something out!
Your bag is full! Take something out!

Ah... I got a good night's sleep...
Oh no! it's already <BLUE>7</BLUE>!

Oh no, I overslept! It's already
<BLUE>8</BLUE>!

It's already <BLUE>10</BLUE>...
I went to bed too late last night!
I have to be careful...
I feel like I'm about to faint...

Any User Generated Content
created within Harvest Moon:
A New Beginning, which includes
main character name, farm name,
and animal names, may be
disclosed to communication
partners.

Please do not use names that
might make people uncomfortable
or contain any illegal content,
include personal information,
or violate copyrights, portrait
rights, privacy rights, or
other players' rights, such as
rights for personal names.
